channel.title: Html5 on Kev's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Html5 on Kev's Site

item.title: Adventures in JavaScript Canvas
item.description: I’ve been reading a lot about HTML5 recently and it looks like the browser could soon become the dominant application platform. So, I thought I’d have a look at the new canvas element and delve into some JavaScript. To get me started I’ve decided to write a (very) simple version of an old classic zx SpectrumÂ game: Jumping Jack. At the time of writing this only works in browsers that support the new canvas html element.
